info.title: Kahflane API
info.description: AI-powered Knowledge Management System with Multi-Tenant Architecture

post.description:
Register a new tenant and owner account.

Creates user, tenant, membership, provisions schema, and sends
a verification OTP to the provided email.

Login to a specific tenant.

The tenant is determined by subdomain or X-Tenant-Slug header.
Login is blocked until email is verified.
Verify email address with OTP code.
Request a password reset OTP. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.
Change password for authenticated user. Requires current password.
Refresh access token using a refresh token.

get.description: Get all tenants the current user has access to.

Get tenant information by slug.

This endpoint is public to allow checking tenant existence.

Get current tenant information.

Requires authentication.

patch.description:
Update current tenant settings.

Only tenant owners can update settings.

post.description: Invite a user to join the current tenant. Requires admin or owner role.

Accept a tenant invitation. If the user doesn't exist, password and
full_name are required to create an account.
Leave the current tenant. Owners cannot leave if they are the last owner.

get.description: List organizations in current tenant that user has access to.

schema.title: Response List Organizations Api V1 Organizations  Get
Response List Organization Members Api V1 Organizations  Org Id  Members Get

post.description:
Add a member to an organization. The user must already be a tenant member.

Requires admin role.

schema.title: Response List Teams Api V1 Organizations  Org Id  Teams Get

post.description:
Create a new team in an organization.

Requires admin role.

schema.title: Response List Team Members Api V1 Organizations  Org Id  Teams  Team Id  Members Get

post.description:
Add a member to a team.

Requires admin role.

delete.description:
Remove a member from an organization and all its teams.

Requires admin role.

Remove a member from a team.

Requires admin role.

get.description:
List documents accessible to the current user.

Filters by organization, team, and status.

post.description:
Create document metadata manually.

Use upload endpoints for file upload with automatic metadata creation.

Upload a document file.

This endpoint:
1. Validates the file
2. Uploads to S3 storage
3. Creates database record
4. Enqueues for processing

Get a presigned URL for direct client upload.

Use this for large files to upload directly to S3.

Confirm a direct upload and create database record.

Call this after successfully uploading via presigned URL.

delete.description: Delete a document and its file from storage.

get.description: Get a presigned URL to download the document.
Download document file directly (streams from S3).

Readiness check for Kubernetes.

Verifies connectivity to all required services.

AcceptInvitationRequest.title: AcceptInvitationRequest
AcceptInvitationRequest.description: Request to accept a tenant invitation.

InviteMemberRequest.title: InviteMemberRequest
InviteMemberRequest.description: Request to invite a member to the tenant.

RegisterRequest.title: RegisterRequest
RegisterRequest.description: Request body for new tenant registration.

message.title: Message
examples: Account created. Please verify your email.

ResetPasswordRequest.title: ResetPasswordRequest
ResetPasswordRequest.description: Request to reset password with OTP.

VerifyEmailRequest.title: VerifyEmailRequest
VerifyEmailRequest.description: Request to verify email with OTP.
